title: Banana and carrot loaf
ingredients: ['115g butter, melted', '150g caster sugar', '115 g dark brown soft sugar', '2 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla', '4 tablespoons milk', '250g self raising flour', '1/2 teaspoon baking soda', '1 teaspoon cinnamon', '1 teaspoon mixed spice', '1 pinch salt', '2 bananas, mashed', '125g grated carrots', '90g sultanas', 'For the icing', '3 to 4 tablespoons maple syrup', '2 tablespoons butter, softened', '200g cream cheese, softened']
